data.introduce: 本接口实现了BOP出票的功能。
data.business: 支持国内、国际德付通支付方式（BOP）出票功能。
data.functions:
1、支持国内、国际BOP方式出票。
2、支持多种旅客类型出票；
3、支持 PNR 中的全部旅客出票或者部分旅客出票。 
4、支持航段状态是否 RR。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"零售商信息","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"AirBOPTicketIssueInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"PrintNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"打票机号","children":[]},{"name":"TicketingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司","children":[]},{"name":"IsRR","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"是否RR","children":[]},{"name":"DpayPass","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付密码","children":[]},{"name":"PsgrID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客序号","children":[]},{"name":"PassType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客类型。如ADL，INF","children":[]},{"name":"DpayTktType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票类型。仅支持I或者D","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRs","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"openet","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"修改票面状态返回结果","children":[]},{"name":"pnrno","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"currencys","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"currency","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"货币","children":[]}]},{"name":"amounts","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"amount","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"金额","children":[]}]},{"name":"startTktno","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"开始票号","children":[]},{"name":"endTktno","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"结束票号","children":[]},{"name":"originalMsg","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"原文信息","children":[]},{"name":"leagalResp","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"leagalResp","children":[]},{"name":"rrResult","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"RR结果","children":[]},{"name":"multiResps","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"multiResp","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"响应","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"","msgZh":"用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限"},{"code":-303,"name":"","msg":"inner service error","msgZh":"内部服务异常"},{"code":-304,"name":"","msg":"sending commands too fast, try again later","msgZh":"访问速度过快,请稍后再试"},{"code":-305,"name":"","msg":"transaction times limited","msgZh":"访问次数限制"},{"code":-301,"name":"","msg":"office permission denied","msgZh":"Office 没有权限"},{"code":-390,"name":"","msg":"IBE Service Error","msgZh":"IBE服务异常"},{"code":-311,"name":"","msg":"time out, please try again later","msgZh":"操作超时，请稍后再试"},{"code":-306,"name":"","msg":"too many concurrent request for service","msgZh":"访问频率限制"},{"code":-400,"name":"","msg":"format of xml string is not valid","msgZh":"xml内容格式错误"},{"code":-1,"name":"","msg":"Biz Error","msgZh":"业务异常"},{"code":-402,"name":"","msg":"Input error!","msgZh":"输入参数出错"}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRQ>
<POS>
<!-- office号,属性PseudoCityCode存值 -->
<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS177"/>
</POS>
<AirBOPTicketIssueInfo>
<!-- PNR号 -->
<PNR>HR6R6T</PNR>
<!-- 打票机 -->
<PrintNumber>54</PrintNumber>
<!-- 指定航司 -->
<TicketingCarrier>CA</TicketingCarrier>
<!-- 是否RR -->
<IsRR>false</IsRR>
<!-- 支付密码 -->
<DpayPass>123456</DpayPass>
<!-- 旅客序号 -->
<PsgrID>P1</PsgrID>
<!-- 旅客类型 -->
<PassType>ADL</PassType>
<!-- 出票类型 -->
<DpayTktType>D</DpayTktType>
</AirBOPTicketIssueInfo>
</TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRS>
<Result>
<openet>false</openet>
<pnrno>HR6R6T</pnrno>
<currencys>
<currency>CNY</currency>
</currencys>
<amounts>
<amount>1850.0</amount>
</amounts>
<startTktno>999-6921928074</startTktno>
<endTktno>999-6921928074</endTktno>
<originalMsg>CNY1850.00 HR6R6T ;
999-6921928074 ;
e;
</originalMsg>
<leagalResp>true</leagalResp>
<rrResult>100:NO RR REQUEST</rrResult>
<multiResps>
<multiResp>OK</multiResp>
<multiResp>ELECTRONIC TICKET ISSUED ;
e;
</multiResp>
</multiResps>
</Result>
</TES_AirBOPTicketIssueRS>
